text: If you pay attention to the man who is wearing fine clothing and say 2:3 to him ¦ --- CTto him, “Yoʋ sit here in a good place,” but say to the poor man, “Yoʋ 2:3 stand there, or sit here 86.4% ¦ stand there, or sit NA27 TH 1% ¦ stand, or sit there ECM NA28 SBL WH 1%stand there, or sit here under my footstool,”
